[Home](./index.md) &gt; [server](./server.md) &gt; [HYTOPIA](./server.hytopia.md) &gt; [Audio](./server.hytopia.audio.md)

## HYTOPIA.Audio class

An instance of audio, supporting a variety of configuration options.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default class Audio implements protocol.Serializable 
```
**Implements:** protocol.Serializable

## Remarks

Audio instances are created directly as instances. They support a variety of configuration options through the  constructor argument.

## Example


```typescript
(new Audio({
  uri: 'assets/music/song.mp3',
  loop: true,
  volume: 0.5,
})).play(world);
```
